name: KCP Opinionated On-Ramp + Pick Winner Loop
notes: Render path: KCP_ProjectInit.db_path -> all KCP db_path inputs.
Render path: KCP_VariantUnroll list outputs drive CLIP/KSampler list mapping; decoded IMAGE -> KCP_KeyframeSetItemSaveImage.image and idx_list -> idx.
Winner path: KCP_KeyframeSetPick.set_id -> KCP_KeyframeSetLoadBatch.set_id and KCP_KeyframeSetItemPick.set_id.
Winner path: KCP_KeyframeSetItemPick.item_json -> KCP_KeyframeSetMarkPicked.item_json (picked_index=-1) and KCP_KeyframePromoteToAsset.item_json (set_id blank, idx=-1).
Optional status: KCP_KeyframeSetSummary shows N items, saved media count, and picked index.
